title: Loading Error with League client
body:
Often times when I open my league Client, this message shows up: 
Failed to load URL "https://riot:kekHxwVF0FIdQ2__DYdlFw@127.0.0.1:49896/index.html" with error "timed out" (-7).
This only happens sometimes but when it does, I can only start the Client regularly after restarting my pc. I also can't shut down league in the taskmanager.
Has anyone experienced this? Does anyone know a fix? 
Please help since it is really frustrating and happens often.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Is there anything common that you do when this happens, you said this only occurs sometimes.

Perhaps you're launching a specific utility prior to this occurring that is causing your issue.
